title: Battlestar Galactica

awardsHtml:
5 wins & 7 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2004 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Single-Camera Picture Editing for a Miniseries, Movie or a Special
Dany Cooper (editor) (For night 1.)
2004 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Editing for a Miniseries, Movie or a Special
Jack Levy (supervising sound editor) - Daniel Colman (sound editor) - Frank Nolan (sound editor) - Vince Balunas (sound editor) - Chris Boyett (sound editor) - Jeff K. Brunello (sound editor) - Jordan Corngold (music editor) - Doug Madick (foley artist) - Michael Lyle (foley artist) (For night 2.)
2004 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Special Visual Effects for a Miniseries, Movie or a Special
Gary Hutzel (visual effects supervisor) - Patricia Gannon (lead visual effects compositor) - Chris John Jones (lead visual effects compositor) - Lee Stringer (cgi supervisor) - Emile Edwin Smith (cgi supervisor) - Jarrod Davis (lead cgi artist) - Kevin Quattro (lead cgi animator) - Aram Granger (lead cgi animator) - Kyle Toucher (lead cgi animator) (For night 1.)

2004 Nominee VES Award
